# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )


if( WIN32 )

elseif( WIN64 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "guidriverWin32" )
endif()
if( WIN32 )

elseif( WIN64 )

endif()

if ( WIN32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE gucefGUI gucefMT )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE gucefGUI gucefMT )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUIDRIVERWIN32_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN32 )
